title: Bloomberg Markets: Buffett Sells a Third of IBM Holdings
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Buffett Sells a Third of IBM Holdings
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Anurag Rana Senior Analyst:Software & IT Services Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing Warren Buffett, the billionaire chairman of Berkshire Hathaway Inc., selling about a third of his company’s investment in computer-services giant IBM.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
